title: Tusheti National Park
about: Tusheti National Park - National Park on the East Caucasus Mountains. It is located in the structural basin of Tusheti, Akhmeta Municipality, Kakheti Region, 900 - 4800 meters above sea level. Its area is 83007 hectares. It was founded in 2003. Tusheti National Park preserves alpine meadows, glaciers, summits, river sources, some important coenosis, rare and endangered species of animals and endemic relict plants. Also, unique pine forest and forest-forming species - birch, highland oak, apricot, salix caprea.
